If you're looking for a gripping historical war film, "Fury" (2014) starring Brad Pitt and Logan Lerman might be the one for you. It follows a tank commander on his perilous journey across Germany in April 1945.

If you're interested in a high-energy superhero movie, "Super" (2010) starring William Katt and Paul T. Taylor is a great choice. It captures the adventurous spirit of a young superhero and his unwavering determination to save the world.

If you're looking for a more lighthearted and humorous war film, "Why Did I Get Married?" (2007) starring Malik Yoba and Denise Boutte offers a heartwarming and entertaining portrayal of love and marriage in wartime.
